attributes.action: Grant ancestry right as far as  3 generations provided the greatgrandparent was born in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being  an Anglo Indian in India is no joke, even with high qualifications(uk naric certified) stand  second to an Indian because our mother tongue is English, our culture is different/our dressing is  different/our marriage attire is so  English  / in our homes  we  do not eat with fingers as  Indians do, we are brought up to eat with the  fork and  spoon at the table - proper  table manners is a must  in our homes - basically we are foreigners in the eyes of the Indians totally abored by them as we assisted  the English in  taking over the country so many years ago and  they treat us with disdain and we have to live in their country having great grand parents who are either English or Scottish or Irish - this  does not  seem fair to us, we are  all highly educated the minimum being a Bachelors degree with a  certificate in  computer programming we will not be dependant on government funds matter of fact we will be a great source of revenue to the country. We are a race brought up to have stable family lives and  religious in  our outlook. Please  give us Anglo Indians a chance to come back to the land of our ancestors.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
